entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is introduced as Hermione's cat, and later described as a dog. He is mentioned to be friends with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, and is mentioned to have seen Crookshanks before.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's, and is mentioned to be whispering uncertainly about Crookshanks.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Hermione's friend, but his current location is unknown at the time of the story.

relationships.description: Harry has seen Crookshanks before and knows him, indicating a friendship between the two.
Hermione is whispering about Crookshanks, suggesting that she owns or cares for him.
